name: Gravity Error (itch)
description:
GRAVITY ERROR DETECTED

Can be played with keyboard or a controller.

Keyboard

Move - Left/right or a/d

Jump - Space

Magnet - Hold shift

Gamepad

Move - Left stick

Jump - A

Magnet - Hold LB/RB

For GMTK Jam 2018

Edit: It's possible to get yourself stuck in impossible places, so be careful where you jump. I'll implement a checkpoint system after the jam's over.
